reviewText: A book that is a manual for daily living. It has changed my life for the better

This is probably my fault, in that, I did not read the description of what this video was about.  I thought it was a more in depth story of the Orchestra, when, in fact, it was just the clip that was shown on the TV program '60 Minutes'.  I'll be sure to read better in the future for purchases such as this.
An absolutely brilliant documentary which shows the power and resourcefulness of the human spirit. I wept with joy while viewing this example of television producing meaningful content.

I really enjoyed the content that is provided but was disappointed that there was not more than what was on the actual 60
Minutes program that I had already seen.
I loved the music but I wish it could have lasted longer-that's the reason of the 4 stars.....BRAVO for these wonderful people!
